Specimen Type: Various microbiological specimens (e.g., blood, urine, sputum, CSF, wound swabs)
Purpose: To detect and identify infectious agents in clinical specimens and determine their antimicrobial susceptibility for patient management.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container or appropriate transport medium, properly labeled
Equipment: Incubator, culture media, microscopes, biochemical/immunological/molecular identification instruments, automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing systems
